member.name: ID2D1GdiMetafile.GetBounds
member.summary: Gets the bounds of the metafile, in device-independent pixels (DIPs), as reported in the metafile’s header.
member.param: The bounds, in DIPs, of the metafile.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid value was passed to the method.

member.name: ID2D1GdiMetafile.Stream
member.summary: This method streams the contents of the command to the given metafile sink.
member.param: The sink into which Direct2D will call back.

returns.para: The method returns an HRESULT. Possible values include, but are not limited to, those in the following table.

listheader.description: Direct2D could not allocate sufficient memory to complete the call.
An invalid value was passed to the method.

member.name: ID2D1GdiMetafile
member.summary: A Direct2D resource that wraps a WMF, EMF, or EMF+ metafile.
